嗕字的基本解释

嗕
rù
中国古代北方部族名。

嗕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rù］
［《廣韻》而蜀切，入燭，日。］
古代北方部族名。《汉书·匈奴传上》：“匈奴前所得西嗕居左地者……遂南降漢。”颜师古注引孟康曰：“嗕音辱，匈奴種也。”一说嗕为羌族别种。

嗕字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗕； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页202第31
【廣韻】而蜀切【集韻】儒欲切，?音辱。【玉篇】羌別種也。【前漢·匈奴傳】匈奴前所得西嗕居左地者。【註】孟康曰：嗕音辱，匈奴種也。又【馮奉世傳】羽林孤兒，及呼速絫嗕種。【註】劉德曰：嗕音辱，羌別種也。　又【廣韻】囑嗕，憐貌。　又【集韻】奴沃切，音傉。【前漢·匈奴傳註】嗕，師古音奴獨反。　又【前漢·匈奴傳】未至嗕姑地。【註】嗕，力穀反。　又【集韻】乃豆切，音耨。羌別種。【前漢·馮奉世傳釋文】嗕，又乃彀反。

嗕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嗕字的起名意思

暂无。

Whistle
Basic explanation of words
Whistle
rù
Names of tribes in northern China.
Whistle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rù］
["Guangyun" and Shu cut, enter the candle, day. ]
The name of the ancient northern tribe. "Book of Han·The Huns": "The Xiongnu's former income was in the west and the left... Then the south descended to the Han." Yan Shigu quoted Meng Kang as saying: "The Huns are humiliated by the sound, and the Xiongnu breeds." Other species.
Whistle

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗕; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 202 31
[Guang Yun] and Shu Qi [Ji Yun] Confucian desires to cut, and the sound is insulting. [Jade articles] Other kinds of Qiang. [Previous Han·Xiongnu Biography] The Xiongnu's former income lived in the left. [Note] Meng Kang said: Humiliation, Huns also breed. Also [Feng Fengshi Biography] Yulin orphans, and Husu 絫嗕 species. [Note] Liu De said: humiliating sound, Qiang also breeds.　[Guang Yun] again, pitiful appearance.　[Jiyun] Nuwoqie, sound 傉. [Notes on the Biography of the Former Han Xiongnu] Hey, the teacher Gu Yinnu rebelled alone.　 Again [The Biography of the Former Han Xiongnu] hasn't come to Aigudi. [Note] Hey, force the counterattack.　[Jiyun] Naidou cut, sound. Qiang other species. [Explanation on the Biography of Feng Feng of the Former Han Dynasty]
